description.oldValue:
,Outlook mobile will introduce a new MDM setting to allow admins to enable a mandatory request for email labeling before the user starts composing the message for Outlook mobile.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: May CY2023
description.newValue: ,Outlook mobile will introduce a new MDM setting to allow admins to enable a mandatory request for email labeling before the user starts composing the message for Outlook mobile.
